snippet: Last week, the shamanistic British artist Matthew Stone staged a joyously unguarded collaborative performance that felt like an implicit rebuke to the slickness of the art fair.
abstract: Last week, the shamanistic British artist Matthew Stone staged a joyously unguarded collaborative performance that felt like an implicit rebuke to the slickness of the art fair.

headline.main: Art Matters | Amid the Cynicism of Art Basel, an Oasis of Sincerity
